metadata.title: CVE-2024-21163 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: Optimizer).  Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.37 andprior and  8.4.0 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows highprivileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols tocompromise MySQL Server.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatablecrash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server as well as  unauthorized update,insert or delete access to some of MySQL Server accessible data. CVSS 3.1Base Score 5.5 (Integrity and Availability impacts).  CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mariadb-10.1 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
